div.p: Our Charter has been renewed for

div.h1: Discovery Charter School is a tuition-free public charter school that takes education beyond the classroom.

div.p: Our approach to learning is rooted in place-based education, which brings students, their families, and community together to create a learning ecosystem that inspires and supports students to reach their fullest potential. Our K-8 curriculum focuses on building the skills needed to achieve academic excellence, while also serving to help students develop as individuals, stewards, and members of the community.
Our goal is to help students better understand who they are, their place in the community, and how they can work together to make the world better.

div.p: Discovery Charter School is a free public school open to all eligible candidates subject to space and staff availability. No student or applicant at Discovery Charter School shall, on the basis of ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, income level, disabling condition, proficiency in the English language, or athletic ability, be excluded from participation in, be denied the benefits of, or be subjected to discrimination under any educational program or activity.

div.h3: POWERSCHOOL | MY MEALTIME | POLICY, FORMS & DOCS | Employment Opportunities
